skills.title: Front-end
skills.description: A skilled software engineer proficient in front-end technologies. Experienced in building responsive and user-friendly web applications. Passionate about solving complex problems and delivering high-quality code.

skills.title: Back-end
skills.description: A proficient back-end developer with expertise in designing and implementing server-side logic and databases. Experienced in building scalable and efficient APIs. Dedicated to ensuring the performance and security of web applications.

skills.title: Full-stack
skills.description: A versatile full-stack developer proficient in both front-end and back-end technologies. Capable of designing and implementing end-to-end solutions. Skilled in collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver successful projects.

skills.title: DevOps
skills.description: An experienced DevOps engineer proficient in automating deployment pipelines and managing infrastructure as code. Skilled in implementing CI/CD practices and ensuring the reliability and scalability of cloud-based applications.

skills.title: Machine Learning
skills.description: A machine learning engineer with expertise in developing and deploying predictive models and algorithms. Experienced in analyzing large datasets and implementing machine learning solutions to solve real-world problems.
